thread.title: Celebrities React to Moonlight’s Surprise Best Picture Oscar
thread.title_full: Celebrities React to Moonlight’s Surprise Best Picture Oscar

title: Celebrities React to Moonlight’s Surprise Best Picture Oscar
text:
Photo: MARK RALSTON/AFP/Getty Images When Moonlight won the Academy Award for Best Picture late Sunday night — after presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway announced La La Land the winner — Hollywood (and the internet in general) went bonkers. While many made jokes about the epic mix-up and others shared their disbelief at how it unfolded, many shared their respect and love for the under dog Oscars winner. Read their Twitter reactions below.
Because of tonights horrible Oscar mistake I have retained a lawyer to see if I won for DRIVE.
— Albert Brooks (@AlbertBrooks) February 27, 2017 I wrote the ending of the academy awards 2017. @jimmykimmel we really got them!
— M. Night Shyamalan (@MNightShyamalan) February 27, 2017 Wh ??!congratulations Moonlight! My favorite #Oscars in memory!!
— Oprah Winfrey (@Oprah) February 27, 2017 *checks envelope from 1998* #Oscars 
— Air Bud (@AIRBUD) February 27, 2017 STILL SPEECHLESS pic.twitter.com/qe3NUDWAHM 
— Barry Jenkins (@BandryBarry) February 27, 2017 Whoa! What a twist ending! Congrats to the well-deserved #Moonlight for your incredible win!
— Kermit the Frog (@KermitTheFrog) February 27, 2017 Nothing like live TV. Congrats to Moonlight! And to La La Land for such a gracious reaction. #Oscars 
— Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) February 27, 2017 Congratulations to the Moonlight team. It truly is a beautiful film. Well done
— John Legend (@johnlegend) February 27, 2017 That ending to the #oscars should win best picture next year. #holyshit congrats #moonlight 
— Elizabeth Banks (@ElizabethBanks) February 27, 2017 I AM SO HAPPY FOR MOONLIGHT!!!! MY HEART IS BURSTING FOR MOONLIGHT!!
— Constance Wu (@ConstanceWu) February 27, 2017 Summary:

Deserved win by the Moonlight team

Gracious concession by the La La Land team

wtf just happened for everyone else #Oscars 
— Ryan Seacrest (@RyanSeacrest) February 27, 2017 I'm also very sad for the MOONLIGHT crew. I wish that they had the full experience of winning best pic without the awkwardness of it all.
— Jessica Chastain (@jes_chastain) February 27, 2017 I'm mean ... I just ... that's the craziest thing I've ever been witness to. Huge congrats to Moonlight, which is fantastic. Wow.
— Paul Feig (@paulfeig) February 27, 2017 Steve Harvey tonight. via @EbrojiApp #Oscars #Moonlight #LaLaLand pic.twitter.com/MpSO9lhnAZ 
— jesse Williams. (@iJesseWilliams) February 27, 2017 Every film nominated could have won!The grace by the producers of LALa Land to the grace of producers of Moonlight. #class 
— Kristin Chenoweth (@KChenoweth) February 27, 2017 Tags: oscars 2017 celebrities twitter Celebrities React to Moonligh t’s Surprise Best Picture Oscar Share   1 min ago WATCH: The Oscars Got Political Okay, it was mostly Jimmy Kimmel.
10 mins ago The Moonlight Mix-Up, Plus Other Highs, Lows, and Whoas of the 2017 Oscars You’ll always remember where you were when Faye Dunaway said “La La Land.”
1:09 a.m. Amazon and Netflix Just Won the First of What’s Sure to Be Many Oscars Both streaming services picked up wins Sunday night.
1:06 a.m. Celebrities Reactions to Moonlight ’s Surprise Best Picture Oscars Win Moonlight was declared the Best Picture winner only after favorite La La Land was first announced.
12:35 a.m. Moonlight   The
